SECTION_CONTENT: This chemical is considered hazardous by the 2012 OSHA Hazard Communication Standard (29 CFR 1910.1200) Skin Corrosion/irritation Category 1 Serious Eye Damage/Eye Irritation Category 1 Specific target organ toxicity (single exposure) Category 3 Target Organs - Respiratory system. Label Elements Signal Word Danger Hazard Statements Causes severe skin burns and eye damage May cause respiratory irritation ! Precautionary Statements
